channel.title: Menu backgrounds/scenes and eyefinity
channel.description:
there are some troubles with some background maps when player is having eyefinity
[url]https://imgur.com/a/dSc9I[/url]
there is also a bug when i have the game in the taskbar . with the mouse when passing above it writes : black mesa , but if i click right : a box shows with : half-life 2 : deathmatch pin to taskbar close
so the name is wrong or bad

item.title: Menu backgrounds/scenes and eyefinity
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
sixcentgeorge:

there are some troubles with some background maps when player is having eyefinity

https://imgur.com/a/dSc9I

Caused by the high fov. The backgrounds force a fov of 75 using the console command “background_fov 75”

Read full topic
